THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.How the thumbnail visually reinforces th: The thumbnail explicitly references an 'intimate shaving routine' by showing shaving-specific products, a bathroom setting, and a confident woman engaging directly with the viewer. All listed problems are addressed visually (razor, cream, ointment, glove) and by text with 'X' signs next to each.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Any contrasts or mismatches between thum: No significant mismatch; both the thumbnail and title promise a successful, irritation-free shaving routine.
